issue.title: [CI] Allow GH Actions to run on all branches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7133](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7133). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When working from feature branches, it is good to have CI results as well (especially from a fork, before submitting a PR).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7133?focusedCommentId=16972382) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Do we want to run the same builds as for PRs or the same builds as on the master branch?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7133?focusedCommentId=16972387) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I don't know. Probably the same builds as for PRs, but as long as it's on users' forks it's less important.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7133?focusedCommentId=16972426) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
